page.title: 09GOLDEN VALLEY BY-PASS
page.content: THE PART OF THE A40(T) BY OUR SCHOOL IS KNOWN AS THE GOLDEN VALLEY BY-PASS WHICH IS A DUAL CARRIAGE WAY. IT WAS BUILT IN 1968 AND REPLACED THE B4063 WHICH USED TO BE THE MAIN ROAD. THE GOLDEN VALLEY BY-PASS LINKS CHELTENHAM AND GLOUCESTER AND ALSO HAS AN INTER- CHANGE WITH THE M5 MOTORWAY. THE RESULT OF A CENSUS AT 1.00 P.M.OVER HALF AN HOUR FROM GLOUCESTER TO CHELTENHAM :-{76 LORRIES,12 {CARAVANS,7 MOTOR BIKES,1 BUS, 1 COACH, {55 VANS, 2 BIKES, 378 CARS.}CHELTENHAM TO GLOUCESTER :-{79 LORRIES, 5 {CARAVANS, 4 COACHES, 50 VANS, 1 BIKE, {425 CARS.}THE TOTAL FROM GLOUCESTER TO CHELTENHAM WAS{532}.CHELTENHAM TO GLOUCESTER WAS{570. {FULL TOTAL WAS 1102 VEHICLES. }
